title: This ‘Holy Grail of Electric Kettles’ Is Just $27 Today
text:
1 item in this article Photo: Courtesy of the retailer

When we went on a hunt for the best electric kettle on Amazon, we declared the Secura double-wall kettle the best-rated pick. Some features that stood out to over 5,000 reviewers were the cool-touch exterior, the easy-to-pour spout, and the all-stainless-steel construction, even on the inside, which inspired one customer to call it “the Holy Grail of electric kettles.” This isn’t that exact kettle, but it is the newest model from Secura, updated for 2019, and this version has all of the same features, including a plastic-free interior. This newer model can also boil a liter and a half of water in just six minutes, has auto shut-off to make sure you don’t boil-dry, and, right now, is on-sale for just $27, 33 percent off the regular list price (and even less than what you’d pay for the older model).
